channel.title: How Do i get rid of all lag?
channel.description:
My Server is Laggy.. I hate Lag. How do Pk-isle and Hybrid-islez have no lag..
I need to no. i want to still run my server.

item.title: How Do i get rid of all lag?

item.description:

How do Pk-isle and Hybrid-islez have no lag…
[/quote]
They use dedicated servers, they pay so much every month for computers dedicated to running their server.[/quote]
There actualy 50 cents a week for me, but i bought for keeps which was like 70$, and its not copyrighted, so i could realease if i wanted to…
